Hello everyone,

As soon as the game starts to load, I lose control of 1,2,3,4,ESC,space and Z keys on my keyboard. I cannot even use these buttons on any program(chrome, not even notepad) on my windows. When I quit the game everything goes back to normal. Is this a known bug? Can you help me with this problem?

Thanks

I've never heard of this in KSP, but it sounds like a classic "Stuck key" problem. Hit each of these keys 3 times in succession:

Each Ctrl key
Each Alt key
Each Shift key

Try this both in KSP and out of it. If that doesn't cut it, check this thread out for instructions to more thoroughly report your problem:

 

Edited October 17, 2016 by 5thHorseman

Thanks for reply 5thHorseman but I tried what you suggested with no result. I discovered that this issue begins when the game is loading asset bundle definitions during the game start up. Also I noticed that if I do a scroll lock and unlock(FN+INS) the locked buttons just work one time then gets locked again... Could it be related to 6-DOF controls? Because in 6-DOF control settings there was a shortcut activated with scroll lock button. Never seen anything like this problem, its weird..
